ns2:p.#text: The information system provides the capability to:

ns2:li: Capture/record and log all content related to a user session; and
Remotely view/hear all content related to an established user session in real time.

ns2:p.#text: Session auditing activities are developed, integrated, and used in consultation with legal counsel in accordance with applicable federal laws, Executive Orders, directives, policies, or regulations.
The information system initiates session audits at system start-up.
